review: I got a chromecast for the living room which i use and it is perfect, and a fire stick for my moms that she uses for netflix. The problem that I was unaware of that has just come to my attention is that the fire stick drops internet connection every 20 minutes. I tried clearing the app cache and login back in a out of the app. I even tried rebooting the stick, and nothing has worked. The stick is not even 10 feet away from my router. Whats up with that? Is this a hardware or software issue? And this cost more than chromecast? how disappointing...
